descriptionHtml:
Please take a second to try out these settings.

1. Improved Lighting and Shadows
2. Correctly Removes Vertical-Sync and Mouse Acceleration Issues

To Install

Navigate to \"My Games\" inside of \"My Documents\" and drag your \"Skyrim\" folder to your desktop.
Drag the downloaded \"Skyrim\" folder to your \"My Games\" Folder.
Load the save file.
If you like it, drag your saves back into \"Skyrim\"
If you do not, simply delete this \"Skyrim\" folder and drag the original one back.

Your computer will create a new RenderInfo document specific to your card so it will work with any computer. Note the resolution set in this file 1920x1080. Please change this beforehand if necessary.
author: Quitoman
